page.title: 08EDUCATION IN BURNESTON AREA
page.content: When the children leave Burneston School they usually go to either Bedale Comprehensive or Thirsk Comprehensive, depending on where they live. Those who live north of Kirklington go to Bedale, those who live south go to Thirsk. Those who live at Kirklington have a choice, but they usually go to Bedale. Sometimes parents send their children to Boroughbridge or private schools such as Cundall Manor or Harrogate College. Sixth form is available at Northallerton, and there are Further Education Colleges at Scarborough and Harrogate.
